languages.text: {n}Абеляр раскатисто и тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Был когда-то в свите Леди Теодоры техноаколит, разумевший на особом наречии многоуважаемых техножрецов... я начал по настоящему ценить его способности только после того, как его сожрала ксенотварь на одном заштатном мире".

{n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a Tech-Acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр раскатисто и тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Был когда-то в свите Леди Теодоры техноаколит, разумевший на особом наречии многоуважаемых техножрецов... я начал по настоящему ценить его способности только после того, как его сожрала ксенотварь на одном заштатном мире".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a tech-acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

{n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a tech-acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

{n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a tech-acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

{n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a tech-acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

{n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a Tech-Acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは重い、長いため息をついた。{/n}「かつてレディ・シオドーラの従者で、高貴な技術司祭の独特な言葉を理解する技術アコライトがいました…彼の能力の真価に気づいたのは、どこぞの惑星のゼノビーストに食われた後でしたがね」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a Tech-Acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは重い、長いため息をついた。{/n}「かつてレディ・シオドーラの従者で、高貴な技術司祭の独特な言葉を理解する技術アコライトがいました…彼の能力の真価に気づいたのは、どこぞの惑星のゼノビーストに食われた後でしたがね」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人的侍从之中，曾有一位技术侍仆，他很了解尊敬的技术神甫的独特语言……可直到他在某个无名世界被异兽吃掉之后，我才开始意识到他的能力有多么宝贵。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a Tech-Acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人的侍从之中，曾有一位技术侍仆，他很了解尊敬的技术祭司的独特语言……可直到他在某个无名世界被异兽吃掉之后，我才开始意识到他的能力有多么宝贵。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard deja escapar un largo y pesado suspiro.{/n} «Lady Theodora tenía en su séquito a un tecnoacólito que conocía el idioma único de los distinguidos tecnosacerdotes... Hasta que no lo devoró una xenobestia en un mundo insignificante, no me di cuenta de lo útiles que eran sus capacidades».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a Tech-Acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard deja escapar un largo y pesado suspiro.{/n} «Lady Theodora tenía en su séquito a un tecnoacólito que conocía el idioma único de los distinguidos tecnosacerdotes... Hasta que no lo devoró una xenobestia en un mundo insignificante, no me di cuenta de lo útiles que eran sus capacidades».

languages.text: {n}Abélard laisse échapper un long et profond soupir.{/n} « Je me souviens d'un technocompagnon dans l'entourage de dame Théodora qui connaissait la langue si particulière des vénérables technoprêtres... Je n'ai pris conscience de la véritable valeur de ses capacités qu'après qu'il s'est fait dévorer par une xénobête sur un monde lambda. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a Tech-Acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard laisse échapper un long et profond soupir.{/n} « Je me souviens d'un technocompagnon dans l'entourage de dame Théodora qui connaissait la langue si particulière des vénérables technoprêtres... Je n'ai pris conscience de la véritable valeur de ses capacités qu'après qu'il s'est fait dévorer par une xénobête sur un monde lambda. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard seufzt lange und tief.{/n} "Im Gefolge von Lady Theodora gab es mal einen Tech-Akolythen, der die einzigartige Sprache der Techpriester beherrschte ... Den wahren Wert seiner Fähigkeiten erkannte ich erst, nachdem er auf irgendeiner Welt von einer Xenobestie verschlungen worden war."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a Tech-Acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard seufzt lange und tief.{/n} "Im Gefolge von Lady Theodora gab es mal einen Tech-Akolythen, der die einzigartige Sprache der Techpriester beherrschte ... Den wahren Wert seiner Fähigkeiten erkannte ich erst, nachdem er auf irgendeiner Welt von einer Xenobestie verschlungen worden war."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, derinden uzun uzun iç çekiyor.{/n} "Bir zamanlar Leydi Theodora'nın maiyetinde saygıdeğer Tekno Rahiplerin özgün dilini bilen bir Tekno Havari vardı. Hünerlerinin hakiki değerini, ne idiği belirsiz bir dünyada bir zenohayvana kurban gittikten sonra anladım."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard lets out a long and heavy sigh.{/n} "There was once a Tech-Acolyte in Lady Theodora's retinue who knew the unique language of the esteemed Tech-Priests... I only began to realise the true value of his abilities after he'd been devoured by a xenobeast on some nondescript world."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard derinden uzun uzun iç çekiyor.{/n} "Bir zamanlar Leydi Theodora'nın maiyetinde saygıdeğer Tekno Rahiplerin özel dilini bilen bir Tekno Havari vardı. Kabiliyetlerinin gerçek değerini, tanımlanmamış bir dünyada bir zenohayvan tarafından öldürüldükten sonra anladım."
